notes:
you cannot change mode
whilst editing a note!

press "a" to switch
to "tile placement"
mode

hold alt and then left-click
on a map square to change the
currently selected tile to
match

hold shift to stencil
you drawing to within
a single tile
press F12 to save

left click a map square
to place the currently
selected tile

hold ctrl to erase
instead of drawing

left-click and type to
edit a note. press escape
to stop editing

the editing mode is
indicated at the top
left of the screen

in tile edit mode you
draw directly onto
the tiles in the map
editing the map

click on the tiles at
the top right of the
screen to change the
selected tile

annotating
the project

hold alt and then left-click
on a pixel in a tile to use
the colour

middle click and drag to
move around the project

press "r" to switch to
"annotate project" mode

right-click to place
a new note, or delete
an existing one

right click a map
square to erase it
editing tiles

left-click and drag to
draw annotations

drag notes around
with left-click

press space to change
colour. press 1/2/3
to change brush size
welcome to kooltool!
have fun

if you are not in
"tile edit" mode
press escape then q

zoom in and out with
the scroll wheelr

whilst ctrl is held,
each distinct map
square you edit will
be cloned and edited
independently
